ul.li: v2.2 released. The noticeable change is that the dependency on Commons Lang is now gone.
Upgraded the depdency for xmlenc from 0.20 to 0.37. Had to change the XmlEncXmlWriter slightly and improve the unit test.

Rework of system so that it is very adaptable/pluggable. There are two underlying core writers, one on top of xmlenc and the other an osjava version. On top there are multiple decorator pattern implementations.
These include:
On the fly schema checking.
Pretty printing.
Number/Date formatting.
Various empty element options.
